text.name: Illuminate Thy Vacuity
text.desc: Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 3% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded

text.name: Illuminate Thy Vacuity
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 4% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] If [KnowledgeExplored] is 2 or higher, gain Coin Power by ([KnowledgeExplored] -1)

text.name: Illuminate Thy Vacuity
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 5% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] If [KnowledgeExplored] is 2 or higher, gain Coin Power by ([KnowledgeExplored] -1)

text.name: Weight of Knowledge
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 5% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] Discard 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] This Slot gains 2 Aggro next turn

text.name: Weight of Knowledge
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 8% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] Discard 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] This Slot gains 3 Aggro next turn

text.name: Weight of Knowledge
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 10% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] Discard 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] This Slot gains 5 Aggro next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [[Sinking]], gain Clash Power +2

text.name: Excruciating Study
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 15% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] Discard 2 Skills of the lowest ranks in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] This Slot gains 3 Aggro next turn

text.name: Excruciating Study
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 20% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] Discard 2 Skills of the lowest ranks in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] This Slot gains 5 Aggro next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 7+ [[Sinking]], gain Coin Power +1

1090721.name: Missionary of Knowledge
1090721.desc:
1 ally with the highest Max HP gains <sprite name="HitDamageUp"><color=#f8c200><u><link="HitDamageUp">Blunt DMG Up</link></u></color> next turn based on the damage that they took this turn.
(Shield damage included in the calculation. Maxes out when taking damage equal to 15% of Max HP at turn start. Max Blunt DMG Up gained by this effect: 3)

1090701.name: Incandescent Enlightenment
1090701.desc:
Gain <sprite name="HitDamageUp"><color=#f8c200><u><link="HitDamageUp">Blunt DMG Up</link></u></color> next turn based on the damage that this unit took this turn.
(Shield damage included in the calculation. Maxes out when taking damage equal to 25% of Max HP at turn start. Max Blunt DMG Up gained by this effect: 5)
If this unit has 3 [KnowledgeExplored] at the end of the turn, remove 1 negative effect applied to self
